languages.text: This rifle can only perform {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} attacks. Whenever the wielder scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack, they gain an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Этим оружием можно совершать только {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}прицельные{/g} выстрелы. При совершении критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночным{/g} выстрелом персонаж может совершить дополнительную атаку в том же {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This rifle can only perform deadeye shot attacks. Whenever the wielder scores a critical hit with a single-shot attack, they gain an additional attack this turn.

This rifle can only perform {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} attacks. Whenever the wielder scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack, they gain an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Этим оружием можно совершать только {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}прицельные{/g} выстрелы. При совершении критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночным{/g} выстрелом персонаж может совершить дополнительную атаку в том же {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g}.

Whenever the wielder scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack, they gain an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Этим оружием можно совершать только прицельные выстрелы. При совершении критического попадания одиночным выстрелом персонаж может совершить дополнительную атаку в том же ходу.
Этим оружием можно совершать только прицельные выстрелы. При совершении критического попадания одиночным выстрелом персонаж может совершить дополнительную атаку в том же ходу.

languages.text: 这把步枪只能进行{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}致命射击{/g}。每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}造成暴击时，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中都会额外获得一次攻击机会。
languages.original_text: This rifle can only perform {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} attacks. Whenever the wielder scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack, they gain an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 这把步枪只能进行{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}致命射击{/g}。每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}造成暴击时，{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中都会额外获得一次攻击机会。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}デッドアイショット{/g}攻撃のみ可能。{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発{/g}攻撃でクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}を成功させる度、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で追加攻撃を獲得。
languages.original_text: This rifle can only perform {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} attacks. Whenever the wielder scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack, they gain an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}デッドアイショット{/g}攻撃のみ可能。{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発{/g}攻撃でクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}を成功させる度、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で追加攻撃を獲得。

languages.text: Este rifle solo puede realizar ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}disparo certero{/g}. Si el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}mpacta{/g} con un {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}ataque de un solo disparo{/g}, puede realizar un ataque adicional durante el mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: This rifle can only perform {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} attacks. Whenever the wielder scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack, they gain an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Este rifle solo puede realizar ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}disparo certero{/g}. Si el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} con un {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}ataque de un solo disparo{/g}, puede realizar un ataque adicional durante el mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Dieses Gewehr kann nur {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Treffsicherer-Schuss{/g}-Angriffe ausführen. Wann immer der Waffenführer einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff landet, erhält er in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} einen Zusatzangriff.
languages.original_text: This rifle can only perform {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} attacks. Whenever the wielder scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack, they gain an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Dieses Gewehr kann nur {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Deadeye Shot{/g}-Angriffe ausführen. Wann immer der Waffenführer einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff landet, erhält er in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} einen Zusatzangriff.

languages.text: Ce fusil permet uniquement d'effectuer des {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}tirs de précision{/g}. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique dans le cadre d'une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g}, il bénéficie d'une attaque supplémentaire au cours de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique dans le cadre d'une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}au coup par coup{/g}, il bénéficie d'une attaque supplémentaire au cours de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
